metadata.Title: CVE-2023-25585 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in Binutils. The use of an uninitialized field in the struct module *module may lead to application crash and local denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-25585` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

binutils - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm6
binutils-aarch64-linux-gnu - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm6
binutils-alpha-linux-gnu - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm6
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabi - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm6
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabihf - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm6
binutils-hppa-linux-gnu - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm6
binutils-hppa64-linux-gnu - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm6
binutils-m68k-linux-gnu - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm6
binutils-mips-linux-gnu - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm6
binutils-mips64-linux-gnuabi64 - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm6
binutils-mips64el-linux-gnuabi64 - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm6
binutils-mipsel-linux-gnu - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm6
binutils-multiarch - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm6
binutils-powerpc-linux-gnu - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm6
binutils-powerpc-linux-gnuspe - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm6
binutils-powerpc64-linux-gnu - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm6
binutils-powerpc64le-linux-gnu - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm6
binutils-s390x-linux-gnu - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm6
binutils-sh4-linux-gnu - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm6
binutils-source - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm6
binutils-sparc64-linux-gnu - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm6
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

notes.Note: seth-arnold> binutils isn't safe for untrusted inputs.

criterions.comment: binutils package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm6').
